name: BO)))NK
description:
Drone is the concept of the sustained tone as music. BO)))NK is an exploration of what a sustained tone would look like as a melting, mutating, cartoony software toy. 

This project was made for the Drone jam 2022. It is a collaboration between Kjell Håftén and Oljudas. As is usually the case with jam games, there are things left unpolished and janky, but all in all it's a nice little trip.

Controls are F and L (SPACEBAR for fullscreen // alt + F4 = terminate the program). Be patient and tune in to the droning sounds and images.

With love, Kjell Håftén and Oljudas
